A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Not even worth a rental. 

This film spits on the original trilogy and I'm at the point where I don't think I can ever take a Disney film seriously again. Times have changed. Now\, instead of creating films that explore via a fun escape\, stories are being hijacked and given a political undertone which gawks at the majority of people on this planet.

Shame. Disney. You're 2D animation age was supreme! Now look at you - pure burning trash.
